data.name: ErrorUserNotFound
data.value: Username not found in membership database.

data.name: FailedToSendPassword
data.value: Password was changed, but application failed to send email with new password. Please contact administrator.

data.name: NewPasswordForm
data.value: New Password:

data.name: PasswordSent
data.value: Your password has been sent to you.

data.name: UserManagerNotSet
data.value: No callback for creating UserManager registered.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_DuplicateEmail
data.value: A username for that e-mail address already exists. Please enter a different e-mail address.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_DuplicateUserName
data.value: Username already exists. Please enter a different user name.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_InvalidAnswer
data.value: The password retrieval answer provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_InvalidEmail
data.value: The e-mail address provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_InvalidPassword
data.value: The password provided is invalid. Please enter a valid password value.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_InvalidQuestion
data.value: The password retrieval question provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_InvalidUserName
data.value: The user name provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_ProviderError
data.value: The authentication provider returned an error. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_Unknown
data.value: An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: MembershipCreateStatus_UserRejected
data.value: The user creation request has been canceled. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: BusinessPartnerNotFound
data.value: Failed to create user through OrigamModel: BussinesPartner doesn't contain user with specified username.

data.name: IdentityDataAlreadyAssigned
data.value: Identity data is already assigned to the BussinessPartner.

data.name: UserIdNotFound
data.value: User Id not found in the system.

data.name: ErrorEmailConfirmedNotBool
data.value: EmailConfirmed is not of type bool

data.name: ErrorUserIdNotGuid
data.value: UserId is not of type guid

data.name: PasswordNotEnoughNonAlphanumericChars
data.value: Password doesn't contain enought non-alphanumeric chars. Required number is {0}.

data.name: PasswordTooShort
data.value: Password too short. Minimum required lenghts is {0}.

data.name: TokenInvalid
data.value: Invalid, already used or expired link (is only valid for a certain time).

data.name: OldPasswordIncorrect
data.value: Old password incorrect.

data.name: FailedToSendMultiFactorAuthCode
data.value: Failed to send multi factor authentication code. Please contact the support.

data.name: FailedToSendNewUserRegistrationMail
data.value: User registration succeeded but registration e-mail sending failed. Please contact the support.

data.name: InvalidUsernameOrPassword
data.value: Invalid username and/or password.

data.name: AccountLocked
data.value: Account is locked. Please contact the administrator.

data.name: AccountNotConfirmed
data.value: Account is not confirmed. Please confirm it or contact the administrator.

data.name: FailedToSendUserUnlockNotification
data.value: Unlocking the user succeeded but sending notification e-mail to the user failed. Please contact the support.

data.name: BusinessPartnerNotFoundForTheUser
data.value: Business partner for the user {0} not found.

data.name: ChangedPasswordMailTemplate
data.value:
Subject: Password Reset Dear user, your password was changed. If it was not you who requested the password change, please contact your Administrator.
New Password:<%Password%>
Have a nice day Application support

data.name: RegisterNewUserTemplate
data.value:
Subject: Please confirm your new account Dear new user,
A new account for <%PortalBaseUrl%> has been created for you.
Username - <%UserName%> Name - <%Name%> First name - <%FirstName%>
Please confirm your registration and activate your account with this link. <%PortalBaseUrl%>ConfirmEmail?token=<%Token%>&userId=<%UserId%>
Why did you get this email? You or someone else has created an account
Kind regards
Application support

data.name: RegisterNewUser_PortalBaseUrlNotConfigured
data.value: An error occured when generating a confirmation email, please contatct administrator.

data.name: UserUnlockNotificationTemplate
data.value:
Subject: User account got unlocked Hello <%FirstNameAndName%>
Your user account <%UserName%> has been unlocked by the system administrator. You are now able to login again using your known user credentials or ask for a new password in the recovery password process.
Kind regards
Application support

data.name: PasswordResetTokenInvalid
data.value: Unable to set a new password. Invalid, already used or expired link (is only valid for a certain time).

data.name: ResetPasswordMail_PortalBaseUrlNotConfigured
data.value: An error occured while generating a password reset email, please contact the administrator.

data.name: ResetPasswordMailTemplate
data.value:
Subject: Password Reset request Dear <%Name%>,
You or someone else recently requested to reset the password for your account with username '<%UserName%>'.
If you did not make this request, simply disregard this email. It will become invalid after <%TokenValidityHours%> hours or the first use, so you do not have to worry about your account being taken over.
To choose a new password, please click the following link: <%PortalBaseUrl%>ResetPassword?Token=<%Token%>&UserName=<%EscapedUserName%>
Have a nice day Application support

data.name: FailedToSendPasswordResetToken
data.value: Failed to send password reset token. Please contact an administrator.

data.name: PasswordResetMailSent
data.value: A mail with a password reset link has been successfully sent to your email address. Please check your mailbox and finish a password change procedure.

data.name: ErrorEnforceNotBool
data.value: Is not type of Boolean

data.name: No2FAProvider
data.value: Two-factor authentication is required, but second factor provider is not available. Please contact the administrator.

data.name: InvalidUsernameOrPasswordWithAttemptInfo
data.value: Username or password is wrong. You have {0} remaining login attempts. Use "password forgotten" before your account gets blocked.
